data.text: ◄Why do the leaders of nations rage against God?/It is foolish for the nations to be angry with God► [RHQ].
The kings of the nations prepare to revolt;
They shout, “We should free ourselves from their control [MET];
But Yahweh, the one who sits on his throne in heaven, laughs at them;
Then, because he is angry with them, he rebukes them.
Yahweh says, “I have installed my king on Zion, my sacred hill in Jerusalem.”
And his king says, “I will proclaim what Yahweh has decreed.
Ask me to give you the nations,
So then, you kings and other rulers on the earth, act wisely!
Bow down humbly before his son!
